name: Dice Golf (planktoon)
description:
Controls

Use Arrow keys or WASD to move camera around ball

Use mouse to select dice and roll them for the 3 ball attributes

Description

A simple golf game where dice controls the power, angle, and top spin of the ball. 

Made for GMTK2022 game jam with theme "Roll of the dice"

Made by
planktoon
Tobias Sønderbo
